overview: Michael Bego joined Willowridge in 2005 from McKinsey & Company where he was a consultant focusing on clients in the pharmaceutical, industrial, and financial industries. He has previous private equity experience at Linux Global Partners, a New York-based venture capital firm that focused on software investments. While there, Mike was a founder and President of a Linux software firm, Xandros. Prior to business school, he was a consultant at supply chain software firm, Numetrix, for four years before co-founding their Asia-Pacific practice out of Singapore. He received an M.B.A. from Columbia Business School and a B.S. from Cornell University
